originalText.text: I HAD (past tense) such a fear of going to the dentist. But Dr. Fligr and her assistant Debinka are such a great team! They took such good care of me and listened to my dental issues. Love love love them!!!!

text.text: I HAD (past tense) such a fear of going to the dentist. But Dr. Fligr and her assistant Debinka are such a great team! They took such good care of me and listened to my dental issues. Love love love them!!!!

originalText.text: Dr Fligr is amazing she actually cares about her patients.  I normally hate going to the dentist but her and her assistant Debinka do excellent work and make sure you are good every step of way.  I was definitely pleasantly surprised by how thoughtful she is and my dental work was done so quickly and beautifully. No more pain or sensitivity.  Also she doesn't try to talk you into unnecessary procedures. She came highly recommended to me and they were not wrong I'm recommending her to everyone.

text.text: Dr Fligr is amazing she actually cares about her patients.  I normally hate going to the dentist but her and her assistant Debinka do excellent work and make sure you are good every step of way.  I was definitely pleasantly surprised by how thoughtful she is and my dental work was done so quickly and beautifully. No more pain or sensitivity.  Also she doesn't try to talk you into unnecessary procedures. She came highly recommended to me and they were not wrong I'm recommending her to everyone.

originalText.text: Dr Fligr is great. Very professional. I travel from Long Island to see her. Her staff is amazing. She is great with my children. I would recommend anyone with children to see her. Just a wonderful experience.

text.text: Dr Fligr is great. Very professional. I travel from Long Island to see her. Her staff is amazing. She is great with my children. I would recommend anyone with children to see her. Just a wonderful experience.

originalText.text: My family and I have been going to Dr. Fligr for about 7 years and it’s for good reason! She’s always so pleasant and offers information on how to keep your teeth healthy in between visits. Debinka, her assistant, was just as warm and welcoming, offering helpful information and great conversation! My visits are always a pleasure, and I leave feeling more confident and well taken care of. I’ll continue to visit them for all of my dental needs. Thanks, ladies!

text.text: My family and I have been going to Dr. Fligr for about 7 years and it’s for good reason! She’s always so pleasant and offers information on how to keep your teeth healthy in between visits. Debinka, her assistant, was just as warm and welcoming, offering helpful information and great conversation! My visits are always a pleasure, and I leave feeling more confident and well taken care of. I’ll continue to visit them for all of my dental needs. Thanks, ladies!

originalText.text:
I started seeing Dr. Fligr in 2015 and cannot recommend her more.
Her staff has changed a few times since I first became a patient, but they have always been polite and friendly.
As a dentist, she is extremely gentle and patient. She checks in at different parts of a procedure to ensure there is no discomfort and to ask if you need a break.
I recommend her any time I get the opportunity because of how consistent her care has been.
